name: github-application-portfolio
description: Modern GitHub application portfolio with rate limiting, security monitoring, and beautiful UI. Fetches and displays repository information from GitHub organizations with advanced filtering and analytics.

scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/rate-limit | node -e "const data=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf8')); console.log('Rate limit at limit:', data.isAtLimit); console.log('Percentage used:', data.percentageUsed + '%');"
scripts.rate-limit-status: curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/rate-limit/status | node -e "const data=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf8')); console.log('Rate limiting enabled:', data.enabled); console.log('Debug mode:', data.debug); console.log('Remaining requests:', data.status.remaining);"
scripts.cache: curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/cache | node -e "const data=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf8')); console.log('Cache hit rate:', data.hitRate); console.log('Cache size:', data.size, 'entries'); console.log('Memory usage:', data.memoryUsageMB + 'MB');"
scripts.db-repos: curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/db/repos | node -e "const data=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf8')); console.log('Repositories in database:', data.length);"
scripts.db-stats: curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/db/stats | node -e "const data=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf8')); console.log('Database stats:', JSON.stringify(data, null, 2));"
scripts.logs: tail -f logs/app.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No log file found'
scripts.status: curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/rate-limit | node -e "const data=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf8')); console.log('Rate limit usage:', data.percentageUsed + '% (' + data.used + '/' + data.limit + ')'); console.log('Remaining:', data.remaining); console.log('Reset time:', new Date(data.reset).toLocaleString());"
